QuestData.Title: To Stomp or Not To Stomp
QuestData.Description:
Like grandpapaook always say: if a wikket gonna huff the swoof from a dookerhole then plug the dookerhole.
These Da'kani wikkets huffing the green smoke from their dookerholes in the ground. Makes 'em smart and mean. Smart not so bad, mean is bad.
Go into Gorilla Gorge and plug those dookerholes!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collapse Kaja'mite Steam Vents in Gorilla Gorge.
